fileheader.author: Richard Harrison
fileheader.note: Aircraft origin for measurements is the nose.
fileheader.limitation: Spoilers not modelled in ADA101648 - approximations will be used

reference.author: Donald E. Johnston, David G. Mitchell, Thomas T. Myers
reference.title: Invstigation of High-Angle-of-Attack Maneuver-limiting factors, Part I: Anaylsis and simulation

reference.author: Donald E. Johnston, David G. Mitchell, Thomas T. Myers
reference.title: Invstigation of High-Angle-of-Attack Maneuver-limiting factors, Part III: Appendices aerodynamic models

reference.author: Sue B. Grafton and Ernie L. Anglin
reference.title: DYNAMIC STABILITY DERIVATIVES AT ANGLES OF ATTACK FROM -5deg TO 90deg FOR A VARIABLE-SWEEP FIGHTER CONFIGURATION WITH TWIN VERTICAL TAILS

switch.name: fcs/yaw-damper-active
switch.test: attitude/theta-rad ge -1.0 attitude/theta-rad le 1.0 aero/alpha-rad ge -0.175438596491228 aero/alpha-rad le 0.175438596491228 fcs/yaw-damper-enable ne 0.0

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClSweepFactor
function.description: Wing sweep factor from norm of 22

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDSLM
function.description: Delta Cl due to mean slat position

function.name: aero/coefficients/ClDFM
function.description: Delta Cl due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDSLM
function.description: Delta Cd due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CdDFM
function.description: Delta Cd due to mean flap position

function.name: aero/coefficients/CMDFM
function.description: CM increment due to flap mean position
